text: Paige Audi DeSorbo (born November 4, 1992) is an television personality and podcaster. She is best known as a main cast member on the Bravo reality television series Summer House. DeSorbo is also known as a former main cast member on the spin-off Winter House and as a guest cast member on the Bravo reality television series Southern Charm. == Early life == Paige DeSorbo was born in New York, New York City on November 4, 1992. Her parents are Gary DeSorbo and Kimberly DeSorbo. DeSorbo attended Academy of the Holy Names. She graduated from the College of Saint Rose with her bachelor's degree in broadcast journalism in 2015. == Career == === Modeling === DeSorbo began her career as a model at the age of five. She stopped modeling in 2010. DeSorbo has appeared in television adverts. She once appeared in Teen Vogue. She is featured on a series of teen fiction book covers. === Journalism === DeSorbo interned at CBS 6 in Niskayuna. DeSorbo worked as the executive assistant to the vice president of unscripted TV at ABC and as a fashion writer for Betches. She lost both these jobs when she began filming for Summer House. === Television === DeSorbo made her television debut when she joined the main cast of the Bravo reality television series Summer House from the third season on March 4, 2019. DeSorbo appeared as a main cast member on a spin-off from Summer House, Winter House, for the first two seasons. The first season premiered on October 20, 2021. The second season premiered on October 13, 2022. DeSorbo has appeared on Southern Charm in a guest capacity since the eighth season premiered on June 23, 2022. === Other ventures === DeSorbo and her Summer House co-star Hannah Berner launched their Giggly Squad podcast on October 27, 2020. == Personal life == DeSorbo resides in New York City. === Relationships === DeSorbo was in a relationship with Perry Rahbar between September 2019 and October 2020. She was in a relationship with Craig Conover from October 2021 to December 2024. == References == Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:American television personalities
title: Paige DeSorbo
